channel.title: CVE Feed for DearHive -- PDF Viewer & 3D PDF Flipbook – DearPDF
channel.description: The latest CVEs for DearHive -- PDF Viewer & 3D PDF Flipbook – DearPDF

item.title: CVE-2024-23505|2024-01-31T15:23:42.308Z -- DearHive -- PDF Viewer & 3D PDF Flipbook – DearPDF
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in DearHive PDF Viewer & 3D PDF Flipbook – DearPDF allows Stored XSS.This issue affects PDF Viewer & 3D PDF Flipbook – DearPDF: from n/a through 2.0.38.
